meanings.definition: A parasitic protozoan of the genus Trypanosoma.
meanings.sent1: The trypan caused illness in the animal.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study trypan to understand its impact on health.
meanings.sent3: The trypan threw a party inside the host's body.
meanings.sent4: The trypan spread through the bloodstream like a silent invader.
meanings.sent5: The trypan's presence was as unwelcome as a storm on a sunny day.

meanings.definition: A drug used to treat trypanosomiasis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed trypan to combat the disease.
meanings.sent2: Trypan is essential in the fight against trypanosomiasis.
meanings.sent3: The trypan medicine danced in the bottle, ready to heal.
meanings.sent4: The trypan medication acted like a superhero fighting off evil invaders.
meanings.sent5: The trypan treatment was a beacon of hope in the darkness of illness.

meanings.definition: To attempt or make an effort.
meanings.sent1: She will trypan to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: I trypan to learn something new every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to trypan catching the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed made him trypan harder than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The team will trypan their best to win the championship.
